Package com.payd.shooti.entities

Class BoundsEntity

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.math.Bounds
com.payd.shooti.entities.BoundsEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoundsObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
FurnitureSlot, GameCursor, GameCursorPointerLegacy, ProceduralPlanetPlot, ProceduralTerrainFakeTileExtension, SimpleEntity, TiledRoomIndividualTile
public class BoundsEntity extends Bounds implements IBoundsObject
BoundsEntity exists as a base class for entities which require a bounding box for positioning, collision, general math or anything related. BoundsEntity is not rendered and does not have a sprite. BoundsEntity has a Bounds.bounds Rectangle which is used for positioning. The BoundsEntity class covers all position and dimensions related functions. worldWidth() & worldHeight() return the width and height relative to the Box2D physics world. resizeToSprite(GameSprite) and resizeToTextureRegion(TextureRegion) are utility functions for resizing the bounds to a sprite or texture region.
Since:
1.0
See Also:
  • Rectangle

    • cachedEdge

      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 cachedEdge(EDirection direction, float edgeX, float edgeY)
      Returns the cached edge for the given direction. If the edge does not exist in the cache, it creates a new edge and adds it to the cache. If the edge in the cache does not match the given edge values, it updates the cached edge and returns it.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction of the edge
      edgeX - the x-coordinate of the edge
      edgeY - the y-coordinate of the edge
      Returns:
      the cached edge for the given direction
